name: Bitcoin Icons
description:
Easily find and insert icons from the Bitcoin Icon Set into your designs. Included icons cover bitcoin-specific needs like wallet, node, exchange, and transactions, as well as more general icons applications typically need like arrows, home, and menu.


This is the first release of the plugin and includes basic search and insertion functionality (just a click). It will be updated as updates to the icon set are released.


For feedback and feature requests, post an issue in the Github repo.
